name: Sun Defender
description:
Kill as many of the Computer Virus' before the sunsets!

How to Play:

You are a programmer and there is a computer virus on your computer!

Kill as many of the Computer Virus Entity's before the sunsets!

There are powerups throughout the world, BLUE refills your ammo, Green gives you energy for your power attack, and RED gives you temporary rapid fire!

Get as high a score as you can by killing the Virus'! Headshots will give you a critical bonus.

Controls: 

WASD - Move

Space - jump/double jump

Left click - Shoot laser gun

R - Reload

Left shift - use power attack

Credits: Music, textures, programming, models - Me
